prompts: Show me a bird-like Pokemon with a sword and a green feathered cape.
Imagine a warrior Pokemon that uses a leek as a weapon and has a proud stance.
Create a noble-looking Pokemon with white feathers and a determined expression.
Generate an elegant Pokemon that embodies the spirit of chivalry and nature.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a knight with leafy armor and a sword-like leek.
Design a Pokemon with a striking green and white color scheme, showcasing its leafy attributes.
Give me a Pokemon that stands tall and proud, equipped with a unique weapon.
